attributes.action: Remove the speed limit on Windermere that was imposed in 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Windermere was the only lake in the Lake District that you could use power boats on and that you could partake in wake boarding and water skiing.  This was on only a certain area of the lake.  In 2005 a 10mph speed limit was imposed by the Lake District National Park which has lead to a decline in tourism and so revenue into the area and many local business' have suffered directly due to the speed limit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
